event_name: DeFi Leasing and Staking on Filecoin
description: A framework and opportunity to evaluate the staking and leasing service providers building on the Filecoin Virtual Machine. Come hear from teams building DeFi solutions on Filecoin and other contributors to this quickly growing ecosystem. Presenters include: Secured Finance, Glif, Collectif DAO, stFIL, HashMix, Starboard, CryptoEconLab, and much more!

sessions.name: Filecoin DeFi Context
sessions.description: Setting the stage for DeFi's explosive growth on Filecoin (made possible by the Filecoin Virtual Machine)

sessions.name: CollectifDAO DeepDive
sessions.description: The CollectifDAO team takes you into a high level overview of their DeFi liquid staking platform.

sessions.name: Smart Contract Security (Zokyo)
sessions.description: Hartej, the founder of Zokyo will give a keynote presentation on the importance of smart contract audits and the role they play in securing DeFi ecosystems

sessions.name: web3mine Deep Dive
sessions.description: Join the web3mine team as they present a demo of their staking product and shed light on the future product roadmap

sessions.name: Interplanetary Consensus and Filecoin DeFi
sessions.description: Longfei from the Filecoin DX team will share more about the future of IPC and how fund transfers from parent to child subnets can revolutionize Filecoin DeFi

sessions.name: Secured Finance Deep Dive
sessions.description: Timo and Masa from the Secured Finance team will share some exciting updates about the Secured Finance platform and upcoming launch!

sessions.name: SP and Token Holder Testimonial Panel
sessions.description: SPs who leverage a Filecoin DeFi Liquid Staking Platform will share more about what features and offerings a platform must provide in order to be optimal for SP use. Token Holders will also share more about what they are looking for in a DeFi staking solution.

sessions.name: Filecoin Cryptoeconomics and DeFi
sessions.description: The Starboard team will share more about their DeFi Leaderboard, as well as explore how Filecoin's tokenomics are affected by DeFi primitives.

sessions.name: web3mine Deep Dive
sessions.description: Join the web3mine team as they present a demo of their staking product and shed light on the future product roadmap

sessions.name: Networking Session
sessions.description:
All Filecoin DeFi Protocols in attendance will have an opportunity to set up space in the venue and chat with interested token holders and SPs in a conference-style setting. 

Participants include: Secured Finance, Glif, CollectifDAO, stFIL, HashKing, web3mine, and more!
